traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The evoker is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The evoker has the following wizard spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt* , light* , prestidigitation, ray of frost* 1st level (4 slots): burning hands* , mage armor, magic missile* 2nd level (3 slots): mirror image, misty step, shatter* 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball* , lightning bolt* 4th level (3 slots): ice storm* , stoneskin 5th level (2 slots): Bigby's hand* , cone of cold* 6th level (1 slot): chain lightning* , wall of ice* *Evocation spell

traits.name: Sculpt Spells
traits.desc: When the evoker casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
